metadata.title: CVE-2023-0302 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Failure to Sanitize Special Elements into a Different Plane (SpecialElement Injection) in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.8.2.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
